TopicTitle: Can Mod Makers Make a New Planet?

Articles.Content: I've seen mods with asteroids and such, but can mod makers make a new planet that's on rails and has moons and has an atmosphere? It's not a request, but more of a curious question (great wording).

There was someone working on it before the forum breakdown, it was probably lost during that.

I don't have the time to search for it right now, but iirc the guy's name was Hofugir or something similar.

If you're willing to not use any manually-created heightmaps, I think it could be done... it's just a matter of actually figuring out how to access all the required things that go into making a new planet, via a plugin.

That is partially true. Legal restrictions only kick in when you try to distribute your work and Squad is touchy about people decompiling the game, which is really the best and least buggy way to add a planet. So basically, if you can do it without decompiling stuff, which can be done but is a lot more buggy, you are 100% legal. If you feel like secretly breaking the EULA and pushing international copyright laws, you could tap the source code, though this is not advised unless you are an extremely compentent coder. Decompile at your own risk.

Now this is the type of question I love! Hi! I am a game developer/programmer and to respond this question is simple. Yes, you can make planets, heck even other galaxies!

This is going to be difficult though. Since every planet must be sphere and they are created in unity3d game engine. The first step is getting a 3d modeling program such as blender. In blender you must create a sphere and re size it to a specified size. Step 2 is to do whatever with the planet! Create mountains, Ice Caps, Cities, but not oceans! You make oceans in the game engine itself. Step 3, apply a texture to all land. Step 4, Bring into Unity3d and apply a ocean if you want. Step 5, Apply a script to make the planet spin and rotation to the sun. Step 6, Test the mod for bugs or errors.

Right pretty straight forward although I have know idea how to 3d model things!
